name: [LD36] Hair Technology
description:
# About Game

* There they came, Alien and War
* The Ancient Hair Technology is the only hope
* Protect world with special hair style

* 6 kinds of hair style, each has own ability
* Generated map, hair item and enemy
* Game in Ludum Dare 36

# About Operation

* Move - WASD and Arrow Keys
* Jump - Space
* Attack - Left Ctrl or Mouse Left
* E - Use hair cut point beside steles
* \ - Change between front camera and follow camera

# What's More

* The 6 styles are: Normal, Gun, Tank, Sword, Snipper, Jumpper
* There are white and black steles in game
* The white one generates Normal, Gun, Snipper and Jumpper
* The black one generates Tank and Sword

# For WYQ

JE T'AIME
